## ReservedInstance Resource Properties {#properties}

To learn more about resource properties and how to use them, see [Inputs and Outputs]({{< relref "/docs/intro/concepts/programming-model#outputs" >}}) in the Programming Model docs.

### Inputs

The ReservedInstance resource accepts the following [input]({{< relref "/docs/intro/concepts/programming-model#outputs" >}}) properties:





<dl class="resources-properties">

    <dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span>Instance<wbr>Type</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Instance type of the RI. For more information, see [Instance type families](https://www.alibabacloud.com/help/doc-detail/25378.html).
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Description</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Description of the RI. 2 to 256 English or Chinese characters. It cannot start with http:// or https://.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Instance<wbr>Amount</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">int</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Number of instances allocated to an RI (An RI is a coupon that includes one or more allocated instances.).
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Name</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Name of the RI. The name must be a string of 2 to 128 characters in length and can contain letters, numbers, colons (:), underscores (_), and hyphens. It must start with a letter. It cannot start with http:// or https://.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Offering<wbr>Type</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Payment type of the RI. Optional values: `No Upfront`: No upfront payment is required., `Partial Upfront`: A portion of upfront payment is required.`All Upfront`: Full upfront payment is required.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Period</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">int</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd></dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Period<wbr>Unit</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Term unit. Optional value: Year.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Platform</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The operating system type of the image used by the instance. Optional values: `Windows`, `Linux`. Default is `Linux`.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Resource<wbr>Group<wbr>Id</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Resource group ID.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Scope</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Scope of the RI. Optional values: `Region`: region-level, `Zone`: zone-level. Default is `Region`.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Zone<wbr>Id</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>ID of the zone to which the RI belongs. When Scope is set to Zone, this parameter is required. For information about the zone list, see [DescribeZones](https://www.alibabacloud.com/help/doc-detail/25610.html).
</dd>

</dl>

        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">float</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd></dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>period_<wbr>unit</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">str</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Term unit. Optional value: Year.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>platform</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">str</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The operating system type of the image used by the instance. Optional values: `Windows`, `Linux`. Default is `Linux`.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>resource_<wbr>group_<wbr>id</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">str</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Resource group ID.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>scope</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">str</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Scope of the RI. Optional values: `Region`: region-level, `Zone`: zone-level. Default is `Region`.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>zone_<wbr>id</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">str</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>ID of the zone to which the RI belongs. When Scope is set to Zone, this parameter is required. For information about the zone list, see [DescribeZones](https://www.alibabacloud.com/help/doc-detail/25610.html).
</dd>

</dl>

        <span>name</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The unique name of the resulting resource.</dd>
    <dt class="property-required" title="Required">
        <span>id</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The <em>unique</em> provider ID of the resource to lookup.</dd>
    <dt class="property-optional" title="Optional">
        <span>state</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Any extra arguments used during the lookup.</dd>
    <dt class="property-optional" title="Optional">
        <span>opts</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>A bag of options that control this resource's behavior.</dd>
</dl>



The following state arguments are supported:




<dl class="resources-properties">

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Description</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Description of the RI. 2 to 256 English or Chinese characters. It cannot start with http:// or https://.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Instance<wbr>Amount</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">int</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Number of instances allocated to an RI (An RI is a coupon that includes one or more allocated instances.).
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Instance<wbr>Type</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Instance type of the RI. For more information, see [Instance type families](https://www.alibabacloud.com/help/doc-detail/25378.html).
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Name</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Name of the RI. The name must be a string of 2 to 128 characters in length and can contain letters, numbers, colons (:), underscores (_), and hyphens. It must start with a letter. It cannot start with http:// or https://.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Offering<wbr>Type</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Payment type of the RI. Optional values: `No Upfront`: No upfront payment is required., `Partial Upfront`: A portion of upfront payment is required.`All Upfront`: Full upfront payment is required.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Period</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">int</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd></dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Period<wbr>Unit</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Term unit. Optional value: Year.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Platform</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The operating system type of the image used by the instance. Optional values: `Windows`, `Linux`. Default is `Linux`.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Resource<wbr>Group<wbr>Id</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Resource group ID.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Scope</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Scope of the RI. Optional values: `Region`: region-level, `Zone`: zone-level. Default is `Region`.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Zone<wbr>Id</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>ID of the zone to which the RI belongs. When Scope is set to Zone, this parameter is required. For information about the zone list, see [DescribeZones](https://www.alibabacloud.com/help/doc-detail/25610.html).
</dd>

</dl>

        <span>description</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">str</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Description of the RI. 2 to 256 English or Chinese characters. It cannot start with http:// or https://.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>instance_<wbr>amount</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">float</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Number of instances allocated to an RI (An RI is a coupon that includes one or more allocated instances.).
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>instance_<wbr>type</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">str</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Instance type of the RI. For more information, see [Instance type families](https://www.alibabacloud.com/help/doc-detail/25378.html).
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>name</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">str</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Name of the RI. The name must be a string of 2 to 128 characters in length and can contain letters, numbers, colons (:), underscores (_), and hyphens. It must start with a letter. It cannot start with http:// or https://.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>offering_<wbr>type</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">str</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Payment type of the RI. Optional values: `No Upfront`: No upfront payment is required., `Partial Upfront`: A portion of upfront payment is required.`All Upfront`: Full upfront payment is required.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>period</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">float</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd></dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>period_<wbr>unit</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">str</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Term unit. Optional value: Year.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>platform</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">str</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The operating system type of the image used by the instance. Optional values: `Windows`, `Linux`. Default is `Linux`.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>resource_<wbr>group_<wbr>id</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">str</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Resource group ID.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>scope</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">str</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Scope of the RI. Optional values: `Region`: region-level, `Zone`: zone-level. Default is `Region`.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>zone_<wbr>id</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">str</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>ID of the zone to which the RI belongs. When Scope is set to Zone, this parameter is required. For information about the zone list, see [DescribeZones](https://www.alibabacloud.com/help/doc-detail/25610.html).
</dd>

</dl>
